narrative.title: Your technical challenge is my specialty

paragraphs.1: I work with founders, managers, and tech teams across Latin America who know what they want to achieve but need a bridge between their business goals and technical execution. My role is to give you clarity on what to do, in what order, and how to measure progress -- so your team moves forward with confidence and your projects deliver real results.
paragraphs.2: My approach blends senior technical leadership with a deeply business-oriented mindset. I understand both software architecture and the metrics your board cares about. That allows me to translate complex technical problems into actionable plans, and walk alongside you through every step until results materialize.
paragraphs.3: I chose to focus on Latin America because I know firsthand the challenges of scaling tech teams in the region: tight budgets, distributed talent, the need to do more with less. It is a market with enormous potential, and I am driven to help companies in the region compete with the same strategic clarity as the best in the world.

hero.title: Converting business goals into technical execution
hero.subtitle: Strategic consulting for founders, managers, and SMEs in Latin America who need clarity, speed, and measurable results from their technology projects.

problem.title: The challenges holding your business back
problem.subtitle: If your company is facing any of these problems, you are not alone. These are the most common obstacles I see in tech teams across LatAm.

1.title: Slow delivery and missed deadlines
1.description: Your team works hard but projects keep falling behind. Delivery dates slip and results do not arrive at the pace your business demands.

2.title: Teams misaligned with the business
2.description: Your technical team and business side speak different languages. Priorities clash and effort gets scattered across work that does not drive real impact.

3.title: Weak planning and reactive execution
3.description: There is no clear technical plan. Decisions are made on the fly, scope changes are constant, and the team spends its time firefighting instead of building.

4.title: No senior technical guidance
4.description: You lack an experienced technical leader who can connect business strategy with team execution. Architecture and technology decisions are made without the big picture in mind.

solution.title: A different approach
solution.description: I work with you to close the gap between what your business needs and what your technical team delivers. I translate your business goals into clear execution plans with real metrics, realistic timelines, and hands-on support every step of the way.

services.title: How I can help
services.subtitle: Four service lines designed to solve the most common challenges facing growing tech teams.

1.title: Strategic Technical Advisory

2.title: Delivery Acceleration
2.description: Workflow optimization, bottleneck removal, and improved delivery cadence for your engineering team.

3.title: Product & Business Alignment
3.description: Direct connection between business strategy and your product roadmap so every sprint delivers real value.

4.title: Fractional Leadership
4.description: Part-time senior technical leadership support without the cost of a full-time hire.

process.title: How we work together
